catalog.importInfo: You can import data to your catalog by using an Excel template. The Excel import supports Item names or Category names or Item short descriptions and Item prices.
catalog.importImageInfo: You can import data to your catalog data by adding a photo of your catalog. The import works for parts of the catalog that have a single category. Ensure your photo is clear with high resolution. This feature is in beta mode.

catalog.importTranslation1: You can change the texts of the catalog items via Excel and translate them to multiple languages.
catalog.importTranslation12: Download the Excel file here that contains all texts of your catalog.
catalog.importTranslation2: The excel file includes languages for which you have at least one item in this language.
catalog.importTranslation3: Update all texts included in the file for your store language and for the different languages. You should not change the structure of the Excel file but only add new texts
catalog.importTranslation4: When you are ready with changes, upload the file for your changes to take effect
catalog.contentDownload: An error has occurred and the file cannot be downloaded
catalog.contentFailedError: An error has occurred and the file cannot be uploaded. Please ensure that the structure of the file has not been changed

error.overlappingSchedules: The schedules cannot be saved as the periods are overlapping

catalog.importTranslationnew: You can import your catalog using an Excel template. You can import item names, category names, descriptions, item prices, discounts and stock data.
catalog.importTranslationnew1: Download the Excel template and fill in your catalog data
catalog.updateTranslation: You can add new items to your catalog or change your existing catalog items using an Excel template. You can import item names, category names, descriptions, item prices, discounts and stock data.
catalog.updateTranslation1: Download the Excel file here that contains your catalog data.
catalog.updateTranslation2: Update the fields of the item that you would like to change. For these, keep the item names the same
catalog.updateTranslation3: Add new rows in the Excel file for new items that you would like to be created
catalog.updateTranslation4: Update the fields in the Excel that you would like to change. The item fields should remain the same if you want to change specific
catalog.allowMultiple: Allow multiple selections of the same item
catalog.catalogOfstoreimported: The catalog creation of the store has started. It might take 10-15 minutes to complete.
catalog.catalogFetching: The catalog is being fetched. Please try again to import after an hour
catalog.catalogUnabletoimport: The catalog could not be imported
